p: We quantified changes in the proteome using liquid chromatography–tandem mass spectrometry (LC–MS/MS) identifying proteins significantly up‐regulated, while growing on either linear alkanes (tetradecane, n‐C 14) or pristane (the branched alkane 2,6,10,14‐Tetramethylpentadecane) looking at the key differences in the expression patterns on each substrate.
